definition: release from custody, subject to provision of a surety, pending investigation (PRC)

sentences.english: Seven are under house detention while another three are out on bail, the report said.
sentences.chinese: 報道說，有七人爲監視居住，另有三人取保候審。

sentences.english: Chapter II detailed analysis of floating population released on "difficult" reasons about the application of the bail pending trial with restricted liberty.
sentences.chinese: 第二章詳細分析造成流動人口取保候審“難”的原因。

sentences.english: Since it is the period of obtaining a guarantor and pending trial, his activities are restricted.
sentences.chinese: 因爲處在取保候審期間，所以他的行動受到限止。
